name: Expensify
description: Add a Expensify Instance to connect your existing Expensify account to the Payments and Billing Hub, allowing you to manage your reports, etc. across multiple  Elements. You will need your Expensify account information to add an instance.

configuration.name: Allow Select Fields parameter
configuration.description: Enables use of global fields query parameter to filter response to only specified fields. This will override any existing vendor functionality on the connector

configuration.name: Filter null values from the response
configuration.description: Used to enable/disable filtering of null values from the responses.

configuration.name: Default select fields
configuration.description: Generic map used to specify default fields for bulk download and GET /all requests. Each key should be the canonical objectName and values may be specified as a comma-delimited string or a list of strings

configuration.name: Event poller refresh interval
configuration.description: Used for how often to poll the application (in minutes)

configuration.name: Event Poller Resources Configuration
configuration.description: Event Poller Resources Configuration. The configuration is defined via JSON, an example of which is as follows - { "contacts": { "url": "/hubs/helpdesk/contacts", “idField”: “user.id”, “datesConfiguration”: { "updatedDateField": "user.updated_at", "updatedDateFormat": "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssX", “createdDateField”: “user.created_at”, “createdDateFormat": "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssX" }, "pageSize": 10000 } }

parameters.name: {   "type": "file",   "credentials": "{credentials}",   "onReceive": {     "immediateResponse": [       "returnRandomFileName"     ]   },   "inputSettings": {     "type": "combinedReportData",     "reportState": null,     "limit": "1",     "filters": {       "startDate": "2016-01-01",       "endDate": null,       "markedAsExported": null,       "reportIDList": null,       "policyIDList": null     },     "employeeEmail": null   },   "outputSettings": {     "fileExtension": "txt"   } }
{     "type": "create",     "credentials": "{credentials}"}
parameters.description: Input Expense Rules data to create

parameters.name: {     "type": "update",     "credentials": "{credentials}"}
parameters.description: Input Expense Rule data to create

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number of resources to retrieve

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of resources to return in a given page

resources.description: Get Reports. In case of large number of reports, the operation might error out with response code 502 from Expensify.

parameters.name: where
parameters.description: The CEQL search expression, or the where clause, without the WHERE keyword, in a typical SQL query. For example reportIDList='42208866'. Possible search fields are reportIDList, policyIDList, startDate, endDate, markedAsExported, employeeEmail, reportState

parameters.name: [   <#list reports as report>   {   "reportId": ${report.reportID},   <#if report.managerUserID?has_content>   "managerUserID": ${report.managerUserID},         <#else>             "managerUserID": null,         </#if>                      <#if report.managerPayrollID?has_content>             "managerPayrollID": ${report.managerPayrollID},         <#else>             "managerPayrollID": null,         </#if>          <#if report.submitterPayrollID?has_content>             "submitterPayrollID": ${report.submitterPayrollID},         <#else>             "submitterPayrollID": null,         </#if>                      <#if report.submitterUserID?has_content>             "submitterUserID": ${report.submitterUserID},         <#else>             "submitterUserID": null,         </#if>          "policyID": "${report.policyID?json_string}",         "accountID": ${report.accountID},         "reportName": "${report.reportName?json_string}", "${report.total?json_string}",         "accountEmail": "${report.accountEmail?json_string}",         "currency": "${report.currency?json_string}",         "isACHReimbursed": "${report.isACHReimbursed?json_string}",         "approved": "${report.approved?json_string}",                     "created": "${report.created?json_string}",         "reimbursed": "${expense.modifiedCreated?json_string}",                 "modifiedMCC": "${expense.modifiedMCC?json_string}",                 "modifiedMerchant": "${expense.modifiedMerchant?json_string}", "${expense.receiptObject.type?json_string}",                     "url": "${expense.receiptObject.url?json_string}"                 }             }<#sep>,</#sep>                     </#list>         ] resources.description: Create a report, with transactions, in a user’s account from your external system
